name: Titamon
effect: [When Digivolving] Trash 1 card in your hand. Then, you may play 1 purple level 4 or lower Digimon card from your trash without paying its memory cost.[Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When you trash a card in your hand using one of your effects, this Digimon gets +2000 DP and ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
